title: Join the Hackathon!

### You're perfect for this hackathon if...

- You like higher-order network analysis or want to learn more about it. 
- You have some experience with programming, especially in a language like Python, R, Julia, or Matlab. 
    - We anticipate that most groups working in this event will work in Python. Python will be the only language that the workshop organizers can guarantee support and troubleshooting for. 
- You want to meet cool new people and collaborate with them in a casual, collaborative environment.
